--- alter_index_add_stored_column.sql
alter index foo add stored column bar

--- AST
&ast.AlterIndex{
  Name: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name: "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  IndexAlteration: &ast.AddStoredColumn{
    Add: 16,
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 34,
      NameEnd: 37,
      Name: "bar",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER INDEX foo ADD STORED COLUMN bar
